text: The following is a list of episodes of the South Korean TV program Let's Eat Dinner Together. (episode 164), the members and guests dined successfully with 298 families, including eight families abroad (three in Japan, three in Russia and four in Hawaii). : – Mission success: Before 20:00 (KST), a family invites the cast / guest (if any) into the house for dinner. : – Mission partially failed: Between 20:00 to 21:30, the cast / guest (if any) managed to have dinner with local resident/s in a convenience store. : – Mission completely failed. ==Episodes== ===2016=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:90%;" |- ! However, due to Onew's controversy of sexual harassment on August 12, 2017 and the pressure from public after, he decided to leave the drama and the production team of this show decided to indefinitely postpone their episode's broadcast. ===2018=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:90%;" |- ! 156 | December 18, 2019 || bgcolor=palegreen|Yeo Jin-goo || bgcolor=palegreen|Im Si-wan (ZE:A) || |- ! 157 | December 25, 2019 || Suwanjigu, Suwan-dong, Gwangsan-gu, Gwangju || bgcolor=palegreen| || bgcolor=palegreen| || |} ;Remark *Jin Goo and Kim Byeong-ok completed the recording for this show in Hwigyeong-dong, Dongdaemun-gu, Seoul to promote their new drama Legal High, and the episode was set to be aired on February 13, 2019. However, due to Kim Byeong-ok's controversy of drink-driving on February 12, 2019, the production team of this show decided to cancel the broadcast of this episode and he subsequently stepped down from the drama. ===2020=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:90%;" |- ! rowspan="2" width="1%"|Episode !! rowspan="2" width="10%"|Air date !! rowspan="2" width="30%"|Visited place !! colspan="2" width="40%"|Special guest(s)/Team !! rowspan="2" width="10%"|Notes/References |- ! width="20%"|Lee Kyung-kyu with !! width="20%"|Kang Ho-dong with |- ! 158 | January 1, 2020 || Hwagok-dong, Gangseo-gu, Seoul || bgcolor=palegreen|Song Ga-in || bgcolor=palegreen| || |- ! 159 | January 8, 2020 || Ahyeon New Town, Mapo-gu, Seoul || bgcolor=palegreen|Lee Jang-woo || bgcolor=palegreen|Yoo Jun-sang || |- ! 160 | January 29, 2020 || Seolmun-dong, Ilsandong-gu, Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do || bgcolor=palegreen| (Kim Hyung-joon, Park Joon-seok) || bgcolor=palegreen|NRG (Chun Myung-hoon, Noh Yoo-min) || |- ! 161 | February 5, 2020 || Yeomgok-dong, Seocho-gu, Seoul || bgcolor=palegreen|Ji Suk-jin || bgcolor=palegreen| || |- ! 162 | February 12, 2020 || Yeonhui-dong, Seodaemun-gu, Seoul || bgcolor=palegreen|Ryu Soo-young || bgcolor=palegreen|In Gyo-jin || |- ! 163 | February 19, 2020 || Dapsimni New Town, Dongdaemun-gu, Seoul || bgcolor=palegreen|Sean (Jinusean) || bgcolor=palegreen|Lee Ji-hye || |- ! 164 | February 26, 2020 || Unjung-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do || bgcolor=palegreen|Rowoon (SF9) || bgcolor=palegreen|Kim Hye- yoon || |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Lists of variety television series episodes Category:Lists of South Korean television series episodes
